name: CARRIE'S NIGHTMARE
description:
You're having a nightmare. Explore and fight your way through to try and wake up. 

Game features: hand-crafted pixel art and music by yours truly, 2D platforming levels + boss fight, Mac + Windows support, and a strange deer. 

This was a solo project and a work of love, donations are greatly appreciated so I can keep making games! Thank you! https://ko-fi.com/noonmarkart

Notes: 
May not be ideal for photosensitive players. Features stark color contrasts + moving flashing elements.  

Experience may be disorienting, but if you find a game-breaking bug/glitch, feel free to shoot me an email at up.on.moonside@gmail.com.
